short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple To-Do List from a very kind student

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retro To-Do List is a nostalgic Chrome extension that brings a touch of vintage charm to your task management. With a pixelated interface reminiscent of classic video games, this extension allows you to create, check off, and clear tasks effortlessly. Embrace the simplicity of a retro-inspired to-do list and stay organized with a hint of old-school flair
